text:
I beleive as ORO was donated to jakarta, the FTP-Task should be updatet to 
reflect that change as well.

The Documentation on the NetComponents downloadpage suggests to use commons-net 
but that doesn't work with the FTP-Task.
creator: jan.schweizer@screen-pilot.de
bodewig@apache.org
text:
The 1.5.x series continues to depend on NetComponents, CVS HEAD and thus 1.6
already depend on commons-net.

creator: conor@apache.org
text: *** Bug 22235 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: RussellDittmar@charter.net
